long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finally! Here's an extension that not only finds great Amazon deals, but it does it in only 1 click.

The fact is, it's a shame for you not to snag great Amazon discounts (up to 90%+ off) when other folks do it so easily.

The 1-Click Amazon Discounts extension does only 1 thing... but it does it well.

Just follow these 3 steps:

1) Decide on a category that you're interested in.

2) Choose the percentage discount you'd like.

3) Click the link and you're IMMEDIATELY taken to the results.

That's it, easy as 1, 2, 3!

Results are currently only for Amazon USA but other locales may soon be added.

Happy Shopping!
